name: Trusty Ducky
description:
A bite sized simple 2D platformer revolving around a duck (or a dinosaur, either or!) on a mission to collect eggs and reach the end of a handful of levels, with a small twist.

Made in 72 hours for the BenBonk Game Jam #1.

------------------------------------------

QUICK CONTROLS:

F - Toggle fullscreen mode!

ESC - Hold for a few seconds to quit the game!

M -  Mutes and un-mutes the music, since the music was thrown together quickly and could get quite annoying!
